title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1655/92 of 26 June 1992 fixing the reference prices for hybrid maize and hybrid sorghum for sowing for the 1992/93 marketing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1655/92  of 26 June 1992  fixing the reference prices for hybrid maize and hybrid sorghum for sowing for the 1992/93 marketing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the 1992/93 marketing year, the reference prices for hybrid maize and hybrid sorghum for sowing falling within CN codes 1005 10 11, 1005 10 13, 1005 10 15 and 1007 00 10 shall be as set out in the Annex hereto.
This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1992. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 June 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 246, 5. 11. 1971, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 163, 26. 6. 1991, p. 39.
(3) OJ No L 168, 26. 7. 1972, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 171, 28. 6. 1986, p. 3.
ANNEX
(ECU/100 kg)
CN code  Description  Reference
prices       Maize:      Seed:        Hybrid (1):   1005 10 11        Double hybrids and top cross hybrids  90  1005 10 13        Three-cross hybrids  100  1005 10 15        Simple hybrids  210   Grain sorghum:   1007 00 10    Hybrids for sowing  125
(1) Entry under this CN code is subject to conditions to be determined by the competent authorities.
